title: Medic
desc:
Choose one card from your DISCARD pile
and play it instantly (no HEROES or SPECIAL cards).

title: Muster
desc:
Find any cards with the same name in
your deck (or hand) and play them instantly.

title: Mardroeme
desc: Triggers transformation of all Berserker cards on the same row.

title: Commander's Horn
desc:
Doubles the strength of all unit cards in
the row in which it is played. Limited to 1 per row.

title: Spy
desc:
Place on your opponent's battlefield and
draw 2 cards from your deck.

title: Biting Frost
desc:
Sets the strength of all Close Combat cards
on the battlefield to 1 for both players.

title: Impenetrable Fog
desc:
Sets the strength of all Ranged cards on
the battlefield to 1 for both players.

title: Clear Weather
desc:
Removes all weather effects from the battlefield.
 This card is discarded after it is played.

title: Agile
desc:
Allows you to place this card on one of
two different lines on the battlefield.

title: Morale Boost
desc: Adds +1 to all units in the row (excluding itself).

title: Scorch
desc:
Kills the strongest card(s) on the battlefield.
This card is discarded after it is played.

title: Berserker
desc: Transforms into a bear when Mardroeme card is on its row.

title: Tight Bond
desc:
Place next to a card with the same name
to double the strength of both cards.

title: Decoy
desc:
Swap with a card on the battlefield to return
it to your hand.
